entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
